message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $16,000 to start negotiations.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I believe $12,500 is still too high for me. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $9,500 is too low for me to accept, but I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Given my budget, I am unable to meet you halfway. My final offer is $11,000 for the product.
